QuestData.Title: A Little Side Action
QuestData.Description:
There are only two things more fun than fighting, and the first is talking trash!
<Usha shouts an insult at Grumbol Grimhammer.>
That boar-beard runt over there's been a thorn in my backside since Alterac... Can't seem to shake him.
We got a bet going about who's the best fighter on the island.
You want to help me win this wager?
